pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Conditional Volatility Modelling and Forecasting // Methods and tools for estimating, simulating and forecasting of so-called BEKK-models (named after Baba, Engle, Kraft and Kroner) based on the fast BerndtHallHallHausman (BHHH) algorithm described in Hafner and Herwartz (2008) doi:10.1007/s00184-007-0130-y. For an overview, we refer the reader to Flle et al. (2024) doi:10.18637/jss.v111.i04.
